mapper.sql: shetc.ht_electronic_tag_controller_id, shetc.electronic_tag_controller_id, shetc.electronic_tag_controller_code, shetc.electronic_tag_controller_name, shetc.electronic_tag_controller_desc, shetc.electronic_tag_controller_ip, shetc.electronic_tag_controller_port, shetc.status, shetc.create_user_id, shetc.create_time, shetc.modified_user_id, shetc.modified_time, shetc.is_delete, shetc.option1, shetc.option2, shetc.option3
mapper.select:
SELECT , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name FROM smt_ht_electronic_tag_controller shetc LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON shetc.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON shetc.modified_user_id = sus.user_id
and date_format(shetc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and shetc.electronic_tag_controller_code like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagControllerCode}, '%')
and shetc.electronic_tag_controller_name like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagControllerName}, '%')
and shetc.electronic_tag_controller_desc like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagControllerDesc}, '%')
and shetc.electronic_tag_controller_ip like CONCAT('%', #{electronicTagControllerIp}, '%')
and shetc.status=#{status}
order by shetc.modified_time desc
